instance_template: loc("Station1"). loc("Junction1"). loc("Junction2"). loc("SubstationA"). loc("SubstationB"). edge("Station1", "Junction1"). edge("Station1", "Junction2"). edge("Junction1", "SubstationA"). edge("Junction2", "SubstationB"). edge("Junction1", "Junction2"). adj(X, Y) :- edge(X, Y). adj(X, Y) :- edge(Y, X). inspect("SubstationA"). inspect("SubstationB"). power(0..8).
generator: 1 { at(L, P) : loc(L) } 1 :- power(P). 1 { inspect_at(L, P) : power(P), P < 8 } :- inspect(L).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: All inspection drones must initialize their route at Station1 at time zero to comply with site safety protocols.
Business Requirements: Drone movement between non-adjacent facilities is strictly prohibited; consecutive positions must be connected via defined edges or represent a stationary inspection event.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, P), at(L2, P+1), L1 != L2, not adj(L1, L2), power(P), power(P+1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: To ensure data integrity, every designated facility in the inspection list must be visited at least once during the power cycle.
Business Requirements: During an inspection, the drone is required to maintain a stationary position for exactly one power unit to complete sensor calibration.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- inspect_at(L, P), not at(L, P+1), power(P+1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Drone sensors must be active at the target facility; an inspection cannot be logged if the drone is not physically present at the site at the start of the inspection.

Business Requirements: Due to signal interference policies, if the route visits Junction2 prior to inspecting SubstationA, the drone is forbidden from passing through Junction1 during that specific interval.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at("Junction2", P1), inspect_at("SubstationA", P2), at("Junction1", P3), P1 < P3, P3 < P2.

soft_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Mission efficiency is a high priority; the system must prioritize routes that minimize the total battery units consumed by the time all mandatory inspections are finalized.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("PowerUsage", (P), P) :- P = #max { T+1 : inspect_at(L, T) }, power(P).
